item.description:
Things to know and bring with you:
$20 (Cost of tubing for 2 hours)
Dress warm and in layers
Gloves
Boots or comfy shoes
Money
Your BIG smile
Goggles (optional)
Helmet (optional)
Hand/toe and other body part warmers (optional)


Plan:
* Meet at the Tubing Park ticket booth at 1:00 pm
* Purchase our tickets for 1:30 - 3:30pm
* Have tons of fun
* Drinks and snacks after tubing at the Outlook Restaurant & Pub by the ski slopes


Here are the directions to the tubing park:
http://www.skinashoba...


Please Note:
You are responsible for finding your ride to and from the Tubing Park.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a green jacket with a hood and a great big smile. Also, my picture should help, too. Meet me at the ticket booth.
item.name: Snow Tubing Nashoba Valley
